mapper.select: SELECT m.id AS musicId, m.title, a.artist_name AS artist, ab.title AS album, a.id AS artistId, ab.id AS albumId, m.duration FROM t_music m,t_artist a,t_album_music am,t_album ab WHERE m.artist_id = a.id AND am.music_id = m.id AND ab.id = am.album_id ORDER BY m.play_times DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT a.*
, ufm.favorite
FROM ( SELECT m.id AS musicId, m.title, a.artist_name AS artist, ab.title AS album, m.duration, a.id AS artistId, ab.id AS albumId FROM t_music m LEFT JOIN t_artist a ON a.id = m.artist_id LEFT JOIN t_album_music am ON am.music_id = m.id LEFT JOIN t_album ab ON ab.id = am.album_id WHERE m.title LIKE #{keyword} LIMIT 20 ) a
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT 1 AS favorite, music_id, user_id FROM t_user_favorite_music ) ufm ON ufm.music_id = a.musicId AND ufm.user_id = #{user.id}

,ufm.favorite

LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT 1 AS favorite, music_id FROM t_user_favorite_music WHERE user_id = #{user.id} ) ufm ON ufm.music_id = a.musicId
